entries.name: Blaues Feuer des Tzeentch
entries.description:
Deine Worte beschw√∂ren einen sich windenden Ball aus funkelndem blauen Feuer dass seine Feinde verschlingt. Blaues Feuer des Tzeentch is a magic missile. Anyone within your Initiative Bonus yards of the target suffers a +3 Damage hit, and gains +1 @Condition[Ablaze] Condition.

Should a Character of size small or larger be reduced to 0 Wounds by this spell, or while suffering from an Ablaze Condition from Blue Fire of Tzeentch, roll a [[/r 1d10]]. On a roll of 9, two @Compendium[wfrp4e-eis.eisactors.cLOGeMqUty61nYB9]{Blue Horror of Tzeentch} claw their way out of the Character’s screaming flesh, killing them in the process.
